title: How do i get a racist banned?(With Prove)
body:
So i was playing Vayne with a Nautilus support, vs Lucian and Morgana. Now, because i have functioning brain cells, i know that fighting Lucian early is suicide, so i told Nautilus to NOT fight him. He did not listen and fed him 4 kills which of course was a lost lane at that point.

During the midgame, he kept blaming ME for HIS deaths and then he got extremely racist. Calling people the N word, saying that Greek people are **** and various other shit. Also he said F-you RIOT multiple times and i do have a screenshot of that also.

So is it possible to actually give the shots to someone so we can get that guy banned? I think such behavior  should not be tolerated in this game.

[REMOVED BY MODERATION-NO NAME AND SHAME]

some actual Prove of the behavior, with his Name and what he said. These particular shots are only the post-game shots. There are many more where these came from, including the racistic comments against me and other players.

replies.body:
Hello. I've removed the links from your post since name and shame is not allowed on the forums.

Feel free to contact us at the [Moderation Discord](https://discordapp.com/channels/230113905668653056/306220435262144512) or at [Discuss the Boards]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) for any questions, comments or concerns about this. Thank you and have a good day.

Name and shame is against the rules on the boards, and if they said that kind of stuff and you reported them they will get a 14 day suspension for firat time offense or a perma ban if they have had a 14 day suspension already.

i really hope so. I do not appreciate my race being called out like that and i also do not appreciate someone actually insulting the Riot team. I just want a clean and fair game. I just wish i could show Riot all of the screenshots i took from the game.

1. You can submit a support ticket.
2. Why the hell do you even care? You could have just pressed the mute button and be happy with your life.

> [{quoted}](name=Aladoron,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=N9nE4Yt4,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-07-19T10:36:25.870+0000)
> 2. Why the hell do you even care? You could have just pressed the mute button and be happy with your life.

But then he wouldnt be able to play the victim :/

How would he know you are Greek and how is Greek a distinct race?  I would just get over it if I were you.  Don't let your identity function as an insult by letting it bother you.  Don't form an inferiority complex or overcompensate with narcissism.  If someone mentions some trait you have, why should you acknowledge it as an insult and give them that power over you unless there is something wrong about having that trait?  

I can joke about my short stature, the size/shape of my nose, and even ethnic stereotypes about my ancestors being greedy or other ancestors being drunks...  It might help that I am ethnically mixed, so it's rare that someone insults all of my heritage.  Unless someone encourages killing or harming me or my relatives, and I judge it as a real threat (not some misguided kid spouting trash on a game), I try not to take insults to heart.

For your own wellbeing, I would try to get over it if I were you.  Being vindictive isn't a healthy trait.
As the other person here said . . . how in the world would the guy know youâ€™re Greek? Do you just go around broadcasting that in game for some odd reason?

weird thing is i actually did not do that. I did not speak a single word of greek, my username also does not reveal that. I guess he just took a shot. He did insult many races so the chance of one actually being the right one was not that small.
